title: Mudhan Mudhalaga Kadhal Song Lyrics Niram Maratha Pookal
stanzas:
Mudhan Mudhalaga Kadhal Song Lyrics Niram Maratha Pookal
#ilaiyaraja #SPB #SJanaki

kan paarammaa
aathaaram nee illaamal
vaeraethammaa
seethaa en kadhal kodiye
kan paarammaa
aathaaram nee illaamal
vaeraethammaa

aasaiyudan nambi vandha
pennai indru mosam
seitha dhrogiye

un kobam thevai thaanaa
anbae aaruyire.
adhu yaar andha pen
oru nadigaiammaa
andha kaludhaiyai
nee konji anaipadhu thavaru

Mudhan Mudhalaga Kadhal
duet paada vandhayo.
nee kadhal manmadhano
naan parandhu poveno.

jeenathin kanavil vandhaal
un polave.
singaara paavai undhan
vadivaagave.(2)

jeenathaman pola
ennai ennai vandhu
paattu paaddum
dhrogiye.. ayyayoo
chumma thaan jaadayil
sonne en kannae
kanmaniye

enai pol oru pen
indha ulagil illai
oru nadigaiyai pol
enai paarpadhu thavaru.

Mudhan Mudhalaga Kadhal
duet paada vandheney.
en kadhal payingkiliye
nee parandhu pogaadhe.
category: OldSong:Mudhan Mudhalaga Kadhal - Niram Maratha Pookal
